whatwedo.title: Technology
whatwedo.text: Our Coding and Robotics often presents champs with problems, and helps them learn how to make decisions and solve those problems.

whatwedo.title: Arts
whatwedo.text: Our Art activities includes Creative and Martial Arts which enhances building of Confidence and Creativity in Champs.

whatwedo.title: Languages
whatwedo.text: Learning to speak other foreign languages is fun, We teach languages such as French, Mandarin, German and Spanish
